message: Now is the time to ID your friends and their guilds. If we ally, we will likely get on the same server as our non-tempest friends. Please post here if you have any input.
Poking's guild is Lighter Thieves.  They are Sith.  He's getting on the website to set shit up, idk what all that entails.
i'm just gonna buy it, log on, kill shit, be a fucking elite guild member and take absolutely zero responsibility and leadership.
We set them as adversaries and they set us the same. Then we get placed.
i dont really want to know.  lol.  just giving you a heads up

Basically, if we get placed on a server we don't like, we can all choose to goto a diffetrent one, but the guild will not be auto-created and our toons placed in it. We have to do it the old fashioned way
in a perfect world, you get placed on a server with your allies/enemies
lol ok
murderdethkill
yeah, just still have to pick a role/class
Looking forward to hopefully being on same server and chatting/playing with some old tempest peeps and destroying the republic. :)
